channel.title: Non-Pvp server?
channel.description: I'm looking to download a server that I can play at home offline. It would be awesome if it had a few quests and lots of skilling. Nothing that would make you level up instantly. Basically something as close to an offline version of the real game as possible. Much appreciated!

item.title: Non-Pvp server?
item.dc:creator: @jack_muff jack muff
item.description:
@jack_muff wrote:

The majority of servers are all pvp based and have it to where you can max skills way too easily. I never did pvp in the real game, I was always a skiller.
A game where you would have to mine and smith your own armor to raise your combat level to fight npc’s would be amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Non-Pvp server?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I don’t understand how people would want to play offline alone especially when their hosting.

Just download a random server from the downloads section, the majority will work fine.

Read full topic
